content.raw:
I logged into sim-16 and found the `Xorg` was taking 100% of a CPU.  I grabbed the xorg and kern logs; will attach them here.

`initctl stop lightdm` brought down the troublesome `Xorg` process, but `initctl start lightdm` seems to have brought it back on display `:1`, instead of `:0`.

Rebooting the machine to see if that clears things up.
content.html:
I logged into sim-16 and found the Xorg was taking 100% of a CPU. I grabbed the xorg and kern logs; will attach them here.

initctl stop lightdm brought down the troublesome Xorg process, but initctl start lightdm seems to have brought it back on display :1, instead of :0.

Rebooting the machine to see if that clears things up.
